Room.Name: Herman's Blacksmith Forge
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the fiery forge room of Herman the blacksmith.
Room.LongDescription: Herman is the only smith on Uland Island, and does a good business in the repair of armor and light weapons. He doesn't know anything about magic however, and cannot repair such items. He has a couple of helpers who handle the bellows, and his young son is the clerk who takes care of customers.
